Title: Hitting for the Cycle
Plot: A string of deaths, including a gamer found dead on his couch and a newly divorced man at the bottom of a pool, instigate a bet among the CSIs as to whether they've "hit for the cycle" - a homicide, a suicide, an accidental and a natural death all in one night
GuestStars: Travis Aaron Wade, Nathalie Kelley, Kaitlin Doubleday, Nicholas Braun, Ali Hillis, Sal Landi, Jon Wellner
